channel.title: ByteByteGo Newsletter
channel.description: Explain complex systems with simple terms, from the authors of the best-selling system design book series. Join over 1,000,000 friendly readers.

item.title: 【How Google Spanner Powers Trillions of Rows with 5 Nines Availability】Google Spanner如何用5个九的可用性为数万亿行动
item.description: 【How to monitor AWS container environments at scale (Sponsored)】如何大规模监视AWS容器环境（赞助）

item.title: 【Mastering Idempotency: Building Reliable APIs】掌握能力：构建可靠的API
item.description: 【Idempotency is the property of an operation that ensures performing the same action multiple times produces the same outcome as doing it once.】IDEMETINCY是操作的属性，该操作确保多次执行相同的动作与一次相同的结果。

item.title: 【How Netflix Built a Distributed Counter for Billions of User Interactions】Netflix如何为数十亿用户交互建立了分布式计数器
item.description: 【Imagine trying to count millions of events happening worldwide simultaneously while ensuring the results are fast, accurate, and cost-effective.】想象一下，试图同时考虑数百万事件，同时确保结果快速，准确且具有成本效益。

item.title: 【EP148: DeepSeek 1-Pager】EP148：DeepSeek 1-Pager
item.description: 【An AI agent is a software program that can interact with its environment, gather data, and use that data to achieve predetermined goals.】AI代理是一个软件程序，可以与环境进行交互，收集数据并使用该数据实现预定目标。

item.title: 【EP149: JWT 101: Key to Stateless Authentication】EP149：JWT 101：无状态身份验证的关键
item.description: 【JWT or JSON Web Tokens is an open standard for securely transmitting information between two parties. They are widely used for authentication and authorization.】JWT或JSON Web令牌是在两方之间安全传输信息的开放标准。它们被广泛用于身份验证和授权。

item.title: 【Non-Functional Requirements: The Backbone of Great Software - Part 1】非功能要求：出色软件的骨干 - 第1部分
item.description: 【Non-functional requirements (NFRs) are as critical as functional requirements because they define a system's qualities and operational parameters.】非功能要求（NFRS）与功能要求一样至关重要，因为它们定义了系统的质量和操作参数。

item.title: 【Clean Architecture 101: Building Software That Lasts】干净的体系结构101：持续的构建软件
item.description: 【Modern software development often involves complex systems that need to adapt quickly to changes, whether it's user requirements, technology updates, or market shifts.】现代软件开发通常涉及复杂的系统，这些系统需要快速适应变化，无论是用户需求，技术更新还是市场变化。

item.title: 【EP147: The Ultimate API Learning Roadmap】EP147：终极API学习路线图
item.description: 【APIs are the backbone of communication over the Internet.】API是通过互联网通信的骨干。

item.title: 【EP150: 12 Algorithms for System Design Interviews】EP150：12算法系统设计访谈
item.description: 【Bloom Filter: Check if a requested item is in the cache before performing disk operations.】Bloom过滤器：在执行磁盘操作之前，请检查请求的项目是否在缓存中。

item.title: 【AWS Lambda Turns 10】AWS Lambda 10
item.description: 【Disclaimer: The details in this post have been derived from multiple AWS reInvent talks and articles by the Amazon engineering team.】免责声明：这篇文章中的详细信息来自亚马逊工程团队的多个AWS重塑和文章。
